about.title: About the Event
about.subtitle: Learn more about the VI International Congress of Urantia Book Readers

introduction.title: The Meeting
introduction.description: The VI International Congress of Urantia Book Readers is an event that brings together readers and scholars from around the world to share experiences, deepen knowledge, and strengthen bonds of brotherhood.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To promote the study and dissemination of the teachings of The Urantia Book, facilitating the meeting and exchange of experiences between readers of different cultures and nationalities.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be a milestone in the history of the Urantia movement, contributing to the spiritual growth and unity among Urantia Book readers.

brotherhood.title: Brotherhood
brotherhood.description: Promote unity and mutual respect among all participants

knowledge.title: Knowledge
knowledge.description: Encourage in-depth study and understanding of the teachings

spirituality.title: Spirituality
spirituality.description: Cultivate spiritual growth and connection with the Father

diversity.title: Diversity
diversity.description: Value and respect different cultures and perspectives

lectures.title: Inspiring Lectures
lectures.description: Presentations by renowned speakers from the Urantia movement

study_groups.title: Study Groups
study_groups.description: Moments of sharing and discussion in smaller groups

cultural.title: Cultural Program
cultural.description: Artistic and cultural activities for integration

location.title: Event Location
location.description: The event will be held in Guarulhos, São Paulo, Brazil, at a specially chosen venue to provide comfort and easy access to all participants.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: The event is organized by a dedicated team of volunteers and professionals committed to the success of the congress.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We are available to answer your questions and provide more information about the event.

hero.description: Join readers from around the world for a unique experience of communion, learning and spiritual growth.

cta.title: Be Part of This Historic Moment
cta.subtitle: Secure your participation in this unique event

register.description: Register and secure your spot in this unique event.

donate.title: Donations
donate.description: Help us make this event even more special.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about the VI International Congress of Urantia Book Readers 2027

general.q1: When and where will the event be held?
general.a1: The event will be held from October 15-19, 2027, in Guarulhos, São Paulo, Brazil. The venue offers excellent infrastructure and easy access to the international airport.
general.q2: Who can participate in the event?
general.a2: The event is open to all Urantia Book readers, regardless of study time or knowledge level. Beginning students, experienced readers, and all interested parties are welcome.
general.q3: Do I need to be a member of any organization?
general.a3: No, the event is open to all interested parties, regardless of affiliation with any organization or study group.

registration.a1: Registration can be done directly through our website in the 'Register' section. After filling out the form, you will receive payment instructions.
registration.a2: We accept international credit cards, PIX (Brazil), and bank transfers. We offer installment options up to 10x without interest.
registration.a3: Yes, we offer discounts for early registration, groups, and students. Please check the pricing table for more details.

accommodation.q1: What types of accommodation are available?
accommodation.a1: We offer different accommodation options, from single rooms to shared rooms. All options include breakfast and access to all activities.
accommodation.a2: Yes, all main meals (breakfast, lunch, and dinner) are included in the registration. We offer options for different dietary restrictions.
accommodation.a3: Yes, you can extend your stay before or after the event, subject to availability. Contact us to check prices and reservations.

program.a1: The program includes lectures, workshops, study groups, meditation moments, and fellowship. See the complete schedule in the 'Program' section.
program.q2: In what languages will the activities be held?
program.a2: Main activities will have simultaneous translation in Portuguese, English, Spanish, and French to ensure everyone can fully participate.
program.a3: We recommend bringing your copy of The Urantia Book. All additional material will be provided by the organization.

faq.contact_us: Our team is ready to help with any additional questions you may have.
